name: Winter's Light, a WLW story
description:
A short WLW visual novel about Yulia, Guardian of the Sun, and her journey to end the eternal winter that has been cursed onto the land by her brother, Yukio. On the way she meets Athina and Celica, both of which are potential romance options.

The game features a light fantasy world coupled with cute girls and hand drawn backgrounds.

The word count for the game is only 5k, so it isn't an exceedingly long game, but hopefully it will bring a smile to your face!

(Note: due to unforeseen cut in hours for my day job I'm putting the game back to its original price of 1.99$, I'm very sorry for the inconvenience)
